content.question: Let S be the region bounded by the graph of y = x n , the line l, and the x -axis. Express the area of S in terms of n and determine the value of n that maximizes the area of S .

frqParts.text: Let S be the region bounded by the graph of y = x n , the line l, and the x -axis. Express the area of S in terms of n and determine the value of n that maximizes the area of S .

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema
